snippet.title: Ketsui Deathtiny -Kizuna Jigoku Tachi- PV
snippet.description:
We at M2 are proud to introduce Ketsui Deathtiny -Kizuna Jigoku Tachi-, our port of the legendary shooter Ketsui -Kizuna Jigoku Tachi-!

By popular demand, it's now fully localized into English, from the original game's storyline, to the detailed descriptions for each of the endlessly customizable options – a hallmark of our M2ShotTriggers team.

This version also includes 6 (+1 DLC) game modes to help newcomers approach this notoriously merciless shoot-'em-up. With more forgiving game modes to prime you for the original and two training modes that lets you practice individual stages or fight that tough boss over and over again, this is truly a 'Ketsui for the entire Human Race'. 

http://m2stg.com/en/ketsui/

©2002 CAVE Interactive CO., LTD.

©2018 M2 Co., Ltd.


©2020 Sony Interactive Entertainment LLC.
